question: You had an appointment with the bank and now you realized that you can't make it for that .write a letter to the manager-Give details about your appointment and dates.-Explain the reason why you cannot make it.-Ask for other dates.
text: I am Prabhjot Kaur, resident of Kamal Park, Aman Nagar at Jalandhar City. I am writing this letter to draw your attention to my problem. I have booked an appointment with you regarding a car loan for the 24th of November. Unfortunately, I shall not be able to make it on that day. I apologise for this inconvenience caused because of you.

My aunt and uncle are arriving from Canada for a week. They informed me yesterday that they will come back to our home. I have to be with them during the entire week. Therefore, I have cancelled my all meetings as well as postponed some crucial appointments. Actually, my relatives trust our Indian doctors too much and they want to get their medical examination done from here.

I would appreciate it if you could reschedule our consultation for any day  next week. Also, if you have any query then feel free to contact me on my number 7888529592 or email me on [email protected]
